Reference Phase Calculation Module¶

This Python module implements a reference phase estimation algorithm and is based on the function ‘refphsest.m’ of the Matlab Pirate package.

exception pyrate.ref_phs_est.ReferencePhaseError[source]¶

Generic class for errors in reference phase estimation.

pyrate.ref_phs_est.est_ref_phase_method1(ifgs, params)[source]¶

Reference phase estimation using method 1. Reference phase is the median of the whole interferogram image.

Parameters:
  • ifgs (list) – List of interferogram objects
  • params (dict) – Dictionary of configuration parameters
Returns:

ref_phs: Numpy array of reference phase values of size (nifgs, 1)
Return type:

ndarray
Returns:

ifgs: Reference phase data is removed interferograms in place
pyrate.ref_phs_est.est_ref_phase_method2(ifgs, params, refpx, refpy)[source]¶

Reference phase estimation using method 2. Reference phase is the median calculated with a patch around the supplied reference pixel.

Parameters:
  • ifgs (list) – List of interferogram objects
  • params (dict) – Dictionary of configuration parameters
  • refpx (int) – Reference pixel X found by ref pixel method
  • refpy (int) – Reference pixel Y found by ref pixel method
Returns:

ref_phs: Numpy array of reference phase values of size (nifgs, 1)
Return type:

ndarray
Returns:

ifgs: Reference phase data is removed interferograms in place
pyrate.ref_phs_est.estimate_ref_phase(ifgs, params, refpx, refpy)[source]¶

Wrapper function for reference phase estimation and interferogram correction.

Parameters:
  • ifgs (list) – List of interferogram objects
  • params (dict) – Dictionary of configuration parameters
  • refpx (int) – Reference pixel X found by ref pixel method
  • refpy (int) – Reference pixel Y found by ref pixel method
Returns:

ref_phs: Numpy array of reference phase values of size (nifgs, 1)
Return type:

ndarray
Returns:

ifgs: Reference phase data is removed interferograms in place
